mapper.select: SELECT ur.ws_id, u.user_id, u.user_pwd, u.user_enabled, r.role_type FROM gc_user_role ur JOIN gc_user u ON ur.user_id = u.user_id JOIN gc_role r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{user_id} and ur.ws_id = 2

SELECT UR.IS_FAV, W.WS_ID, W.WS_NAME, UR.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_TYPE from GC_USER_ROLE UR INNER JOIN GC_USER U ON (U.user_id = UR.user_id) INNER JOIN GC_ROLE R ON (R.role_id = UR.role_id) INNER JOIN GC_WS W ON(W.WS_ID = UR.WS_ID) WHERE UR.USER_ID=#{user_id}
SELECT w.ws_id, w.ws_name, n.noti_type, n.noti_desc, n.noti_time FROM gc_noti n JOIN gc_ws w ON w.ws_id = n.ws_id JOIN gc_noti_user nu ON nu.noti_id = n.noti_id WHERE nu.user_id= #{user_id}
